TopicTitle: What The Hell Happened To Parachutes?

Articles.Content:
:mad:Why are all my parachutes practically NOT THERE?????

I just had a career flight and I put 11 ....ing parachutes on a craft that was very light!

Not only did it accelerate* with all parachutes fully deployed, (at 100m/s) but the contract I was trying to do DIDN'T WORK. I have completed this one contract 3 times! It has not given me any credit!

This is why I don't play KSP now.

*Gravity accelerated it.

Edited October 13, 2015 by CrazyJebGuy
Clarity

Needs moar clarity.

1. Soften the thread title.

2. Add pics.

3. Be cool.

Also, this belongs to Gameplay questions.

Not only did it accelerate* with all parachutes fully deployed,

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/127091-KSP-doesn-t-properly-regenerate-the-physics-cfg-file

Closing.

Try again in the support or gameplay sections with less vitriol.

Thank you.

Edit:

Don't forget logs, pics and a decent description so others know what you mean.

Edited October 13, 2015 by sal_vager
